1600056000.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Middle East
1600056000.descr: Take a look at all the latest news in business, finance and where the markets are headed in this show that focuses on macro issues with a Middle Eastern context. The programme is broadcast from Dubai and hosted by Yousef Gamal El-Din and Manus Cranny.

1600059600.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Europe
1600059600.descr: Don't miss the latest and most important business news and stories from European markets, Wall Street, because overnight there is morning in Europe and around the world. The programme is hosted by Nejra Cehic, live from London with the help from Manus Cranny and some other hosts.

1600063200.title: Bloomberg Markets: European Open
1600063200.descr: Take a look at the European markets at the beginning of the trading day and find out the most important global business and markets news and information. The programme is hosted by Anna Edwards, live from London with the help from Matt Miller in Berlin.

1600070400.title: Bloomberg Surveillance
1600070400.descr: Don't miss the latest news in finance, economics and investment and most important business stories, while you take a look at the state of the markets as each day begins. Join hosts Tom Keene and Francine Lacqua, who broadcast live from New York to London each morning and discuss markets with various leaders in global finance and economics.

1600074000.title: Bloomberg Surveillance
1600074000.descr: Don't miss the latest news in finance, economics and investment and most important business stories, while you take a look at the state of the markets as each day begins. Join hosts Tom Keene and Francine Lacqua, who broadcast live from New York to London each morning and discuss markets with various leaders in global finance and economics.

1600077600.title: Bloomberg Surveillance
1600077600.descr: Don't miss the latest news in finance, economics and investment and most important business stories, while you take a look at the state of the markets as each day begins. Join hosts Tom Keene and Francine Lacqua, who broadcast live from New York to London each morning and discuss markets with various leaders in global finance and economics.

1600081200.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Americas
1600081200.descr: Live from New York, Bloomberg Daybreak: Americas brings viewers the latest in business and finance, providing unique global insights into where industry and markets are headed.

1600088400.title: Bloomberg Markets: The Open
1600088400.descr: Join host Jonathan Ferro as he highlights all the important news you need to know heading into the Opening Bell on Wall Street in New York City. He will show viewers all the latest charts in order to help them understand what to expect every trading day.

1600092000.title: Bloomberg Markets: Americas
1600092000.descr: Find out all the latest and most important markets news and business trends from Western hemisphere. The programme is hosted by Vonnie Quinn, with the help from various other hosts, and it airs live from New York City.

1600095600.title: Bloomberg Markets: European Close
1600095600.descr: Take a look at the European markets at the end of each trading day and hear all the news and the major market moving stories from Europe. Show is hosted by Vonnie Quinn in New York, with the help from Guy Johnson in London.

1600099200.title: Bloomberg Markets: Balance of Power
1600099200.descr: Bloomberg Markets: Balance of Power focuses on the politics and policies being shaped by the agenda of President Trump's administration.

1600102800.title: Bloomberg Markets: Americas
1600102800.descr: Find out all the latest and most important markets news and business trends from Western hemisphere. The programme is hosted by Vonnie Quinn, with the help from various other hosts, and it airs live from New York City.

1600106400.title: Bloomberg Markets: The Close
1600106400.descr: Hosted by Scarlet Fu and Romaine Bostick, Bloomberg Markets: The Close brings you the latest market developments from the financial world. With experts providing detailed analysis the team cover the market's events right up to the closing seconds of trading. Featuring insight from investors and traders the show provides valuable information to anyone with an interest in the finance world.

1600113600.title: What'd You Miss?
1600113600.descr: Take a look at all the latest news and analysis after the closing bell on Wall Street and other markets around the world. Join Caroline Hyde, Romaine Bostick, Taylor Riggs and some other hosts as they bring you a unique perspective on the week's top stories, so you don't miss a thing!

1600117200.title: Bloomberg Technology
1600117200.descr: Hosted by Emily Chang from San Francisco, California, this captivating show focuses on global technology, innovation, and the future of business. It features original reporting and interesting interviews with various tech newsmakers- venture capitalists, CEOs, start-up entrepreneurs, and analysts.

1600120800.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Australia
1600120800.descr: Take a look at all the news, biggest stories, important information, business analysis and more from the Australia, New Zealand, Asia and other markets around the world. Join hosts Haidi Lun Stroud-Watts in Sydney, Shery Ahn in New York and Sophie Kamaruddin in Hong Kong, who will tell you everything you need to know.

1600124400.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Asia
1600124400.descr: Programme that provides viewers with all the important global business and financial information they need as U.S. markets close and Asian markets open. The show airs live from Sydney, New York and Hong Kong with hosts Haidi Lun Stroud-Watts, Shery Ahn and Sophie Kamaruddin.

1600131600.title: Bloomberg Markets: China Open
1600131600.descr: The definitive guide to the markets in Hong Kong and on the mainland. Rishaad Salamat, David Ingles, Tom Mackenzie and Yvonne Man bring you the latest analysis to get you ready for the trading day.

1600135200.title: Bloomberg Markets: Asia
1600135200.descr: Find out all the latest news, important information, interesting stories and business trends from markets in Asia. The show is hosted by various anchors such as David Ingles, Yvonne Man, Rishaad Salamat and Haslinda Amin.
